text: Dr. Bennett, thank you for the update. I've noticed the same with my adult son at home. Looking forward to our meeting.
Glad to hear that! It's become a favorite in our house as well. I'll share more recipes soon.
Yes, Lisa, my adult son Ethan has been going there for his behavioral therapy. It's a wonderful place with caring staff.
Definitely, Lisa. It's been too long. I'll check my schedule and get back to you.
